A note about notes March 24, 2024

Becoming an adult is fucking hard. Becoming an adult is realizing I'm prone to running away from myself. From the piercing silence. Prone to run back into someone's or something's arms because the thought of being alone, in this very instance, neither past nor future, but this, this very instance....
